subject: Business
title: Emergency Funds: Your Financial Safety Net
description: Learn Emergency Funds: Your Financial Safety Net in one minute.

hook.text: 40% of Americans can't cover a $400 emergency expense without borrowing. One flat tire can start a debt spiral.

buildup.text: An emergency fund is liquid cash set aside for unexpected expenses: job loss, medical bills, or urgent repairs.

discovery.text: Financial advisors recommend 3-6 months of living expenses in a high-yield savings account.

twist.text: Without an emergency fund, every surprise becomes debt. With one, a $2,000 car repair is an inconvenience, not a crisis.

climax.text: During COVID layoffs, people with emergency funds had 6 months to pivot. Those without had 6 days.

punchline.text: Build the safety net before you need it. After is too late.
